writings.title: Gravitational Slingshot Dynamics in Three-Body Systems
writings.abstract: Numerical investigation of energy amplification and orbital scattering in three-body gravitational slingshots around starâ€“planet systems.

writings.title: Orbital Determination Research Paper
writings.abstract: Astrometric orbit determination work focused on estimating orbital elements from observational data.

writings.title: Fundamentals of Advanced Machining (Lecture Series)
writings.abstract: Physics-first lecture series covering spindle power, torque limits, chip-load reasoning, and practical CNC process planning for students.

writings.title: Lab 1: Hubble Constant Estimation and Hubble Time Inference
writings.abstract: Weighted least-squares regression and bootstrap resampling applied to Type Ia supernova distance-modulus data to estimate H0 and propagate uncertainty into the Hubble time.

writings.title: Lab 2: Brown Dwarf Temperature Inference with MCMC
writings.abstract: Bayesian fitting of Planck-law spectral models using custom MCMC samplers to estimate brown dwarf effective temperature and quantify posterior sensitivity across prior choices.

writings.title: Lab 3: Exoplanet Transit Detrending and Depth Recovery
writings.abstract: Time-series preprocessing, global detrending, and Bayesian transit fitting used to recover shallow exoplanet transit depth under correlated instrumental systematics.

writings.title: Lab 4: Radial Velocity Model Selection for Gliese 581
writings.abstract: Competing multi-planet radial velocity models evaluated with chi-square fitting, AIC/BIC penalties, and cross-validation to reassess the reported significance of Gliese 581 g.

writings.title: Final Project: Dark Matter vs MOND Rotation-Curve Model Discrimination
writings.abstract: Galaxy rotation curves fit under cold dark matter and MOND frameworks using MCMC validation plus AIC/BIC diagnostics, with synthetic error-scaling tests to quantify data quality required for decisive model separation.
